post.author: 고상호
post.content:
I will send you job description if somebody are interested in this position.
------------------------------------------------
Hello Samgho,
As per our conversation, attached is the job description.
We are looking for a Portal Developer/Support with Java and BEA experience.
This is a 2 part position. The first part is 4 months as a Portal Developer in Toronto, then in Ottawa.
This is a permanent opportunity with Accenture.
Please forward to anyone who might be interested.
Best regards,
Michelle Hess
Accenture HR Services-Recruiter
160 Elgin Street, Ottawa, Ontario
Email: michelle.hess@accenture.com
Phone:613.750.5551
VPN:750/5551 Fax: 613.750.5244
post.title: Posiiton from Accenture
